overview:
Satyajeet spearheads Cleartrip’s Mobile Solutions and defines the product vision & strategy for the brand. He is responsible for every aspect of customer experience on smaller screens across myriad platforms. He has been at the helm of the launch & growth of Cleartrip’s Mobile through product innovation, platform adoption and strategic partnerships.

A web enthusiast, Satyajeet has been building user centric products for both consumers & enterprises for over 7 years. In his previous role at Naukri.com, he has been instrumental in transforming the online recruitment space with astounding hiring solutions including the best in class database product ‘Resdex’. He has also led product development for Jeevansathi.com for a short stint.

He has also been an active member of various Mobile, Internet, and Product forums and contributes frequently in evangelizing mobile web and product management in India.
